metadata.title: CVE-2019-12819 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.0. The function__mdiobus_register() in drivers/net/phy/mdio_bus.c calls put_device(),which will trigger a fixed_mdio_bus_init use-after-free. This will cause adenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12819` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-146-generic - 4.4.0-146.172
linux-image-4.4.0-146-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-146.172
